title: Verify progressive skill disclosure reduces context
description: Measure token savings after implementing progressive disclosure. Target: 40%+ reduction in skill-related context tokens (research showed 46.9% reduction with similar techniques).

acceptanceCriteria.text: Compare to AUDIT-004 baseline (full skills loaded)
Ask: 'What skills are available?' - should list names
Ask: 'I need to review code' - should invoke /coderabbit
Confirm full SKILL.md only loads when Skill tool invoked
Confirm skill content not in context before invocation
Note: before tokens, after tokens, % reduction
Run CodeRabbit review - must pass (or create BUG if unfixable)
Commit: test: V-022 verify progressive skill disclosure
